subject: Prisons and Prisoners
United States International Relations
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Although contrite for suggesting that an American sentenced to 15 years of hard labor by North Korea may have deserved his fate, Rodman continued his whirlwind tour of the country.
snippet: Although contrite for suggesting that an American sentenced to 15 years of hard labor by North Korea may have deserved his fate, Rodman continued his whirlwind tour of the country.
